ShortDescription.Value: Earn achievements naturally even with mods enabled. Keeps the backend on. Enjoy :)

Publish.LongDescription:
# Achievement Fixer Keeps the CS2 achievements active even when you have mods.
## How it works * Automatically re-enables achievements after a city loads. * Just install the mod, start earning achievements naturally. * Stops the in-game warning ("Achievements are disabled because of mods"). * Uses the game’s built-in localization to show readable names.
## Notes * Safe to remove at any time; does not touch saves. * Some achievements shown on Steam are not available until DLCs are released (e.g., 6 from Bridges and Ports). * This mod does not use Reflection or Harmony, so it's safe/compatible, and less likely to break with every game update.
## Supports 9+ languages * English, Français (French), Deutsch (German), Español (Spanish), Italiano (Italian), 日本語 (Japanese) * 한국어 (Korean), Português (Brasil) (Brazilian Portuguese), 简体中文 (Simplified Chinese). * Future updates may add more languages. WIP: Tiếng Việt (Vietnamese)
## Advanced tab * If you want faster (don't like natural), go to the Advanced tab.
## Support Feedback / Bug Report: **Cities: Skylines Modding** Discord: https://discord.gg/HTav7ARPs2
**Credits** * RiverMochi - mod author * inspired by Wayzeware's old Achievement Enabler (defunct) * StarQ for all technical help. * rcav8tr for method to find game localization keys. * Necko1996 for testing * and the CS2 modding community for pointers and testing.
Publish.ChangeLog: **1.0.0** — Initial release. * Enables achievements with mods * UI language support: English, Français (French), Deutsch (German), Español (Spanish), Italiano (Italian), 日本語 (Japanese), 한국어 (Korean), Português (Brasil) (Brazilian Portuguese), 简体中文 (Simplified Chinese). * Hides the in-game 'achievements disabled' banner. * Adds Unlock/Clear/Reset tools.
